products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love the luxury look and feel of cotswold silverton grey then why not take a look at their deluxe option complete with exquisite fabric ribbons? With a unique look that you won't find anywhere else you'll be able to dress your home to impress like never before. We love the look and feel of pairing silverton grey with a mixture of whites, creams, and light greys in the guest bedroom. That way you can create a clean and crisp look that your guests will never want to leave.

products.title: Anthology, Moonstone - Vertical Blind
products.description: The purposeful style of the anthology in moonstone provides the best of both worlds with its gorgeous, woven texture and natural beige hue. The light, supple fabric is of the highest quality, and hangs in neat louvres for easy workability. The traditional room for such a natural material might be the kitchen, where it will undeniably look fantastic amongst hessian fabrics and woven wicker, but why not couple the moonstone with deep chocolate browns in a country living room instead? With this versatile fabric, you'll never run out of options.

products.title: Morning Mist, Spring - Roller Blind
products.description: The morning mist spring is one of their most beautiful and finely crafted blinds. Made from a fine quality, lightweight fabric, spring is printed with a truly stunning range of life-drawn, blossoming wildflowers. Sure to add a sense of artistry that relaxes and entertains in equal measure, the natural colouring and designs of the spring make it an ideal addition to a country-themed kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Morning Mist, Autumn - Roller Blind
products.description: Morning mist autumn is a beautifully crafted filter blind made from the finest lightweight fabric. Printed with a quite wonderful autumn-scape of wildflowers, this blind is sure to add a touch of artistry to whichever room in the house you choose to hang it. A perfect way to add some beauty to a room, the autumn would look striking in a living room or dining room, where you can show it off to friends and family as you relax in the evening.

products.title: Etching, Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: Etching pewter combines a contemporary geometric print with a more traditional textured look that gives your new roller blinds added depth and clarity. The way in which the light greys ebb and flow is sure to set your mind at ease, and leave you with plenty of time to consider how to elevate your decor further. Matching to pewter is all about being subtle with your colours, and clever with your use of space.

products.title: Garden City, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: Garden city shadow adds that urban and contemporary chic feeling to any space your heart desires, and it does so with a striking visual you won't find anywhere else. The signature of the range is that the stripes take on a life of their own, unconstrained by thick outlines or crisp edges. When you want to create a theme that instantly sets your mind at ease there's no better way to do it than to embrace other urban finishes.

products.title: Ashanti, Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti haze is a high quality fabric combined with an effortlessly stylish, contemporary design. The stripes come in various widths, and features lilac, dark purple, fashionable charcoal, and timeless off-white. The way the lilac and dark purple play off one another will add style and character to your home. Why not use the ashanti haze in your bedroom to match your bed linen? Or perhaps use it in the kitchen, where it's uplifting tones are sure to catch the eye.

products.title: Ashanti, Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti crimson combines a top quality fabric with a modern, feel-good design, and alternating strip widths give this filter blind a clean, contemporary feel, whilst the crimson highlighting looks fantastic when contrasted against the black and light browns. Use the light brown backdrop of the crimson to match light and dark woods, as well as country-themed areas in the house. Then let the crimson stripes stand out on their own, and provide your room with a little dash of colour.

products.title: Abstract, Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Abstract stone gets its name from the texture that inspired it, and it's easy to see why. The timeless quality of stone is something that endures and inspires in equal measure, so what better basis for a great addition to your interiors? As the colours drift into one another you are left to ponder precisely how the delicate balance was struck. Matching to the abstract range is all about going in search of complimentary textures.

products.title: Visage, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: Visage shadow is an inspired combination of light and breezy fabric and industrial colouring. The variation in widths is what gives the stripes a life of their own and allows you to get lost in the moment. Exactly what you need when you want to create a space you never want to leave. Allow yourself to be inspired, and add plenty of matching light woody beiges to the mixing pot. This is their advice to you if you want to be able to reframe your living room and bedroom.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Steel
products.description: The day & night brushed steel roller blind, with its textured dark grey design is both a practical and stylish blind. The gorgeous grey contrasts with the opaque stripes and gives this blind a unique feel. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Lifting Mist
products.description: With its striking grey and white granite effect, the day & night brushed lifting mist roller blind is not only a unique blind but a practical one too. The design makes it eye-catching without being vibrant and garish. Combining brilliant light control with a unique, aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Shadows
products.description: With its dark granite-effect fabric, the day & night brushed shadows roller blind offers superb light control as well as a unique, attractive design. The dark grey colour is versatile and can be paired in a variety of ways. Its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Flint
products.description: With its mid-grey textured design, the day & night brushed flint roller blind is both stylish and practical. Grey is very versatile and pairs beautifully with monochrome tones to create amazing interior styles. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate with your favourite shades as you reinvent any room in the house. Think about the contrasts you can create with light walls and floors and darker eye-catching accessories like scatter cushions and a lampshade.

products.title: Hive Blackout Silkweave Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their hive blackout silkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout silkweave" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Radiance Otter Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Give shape and decorative intrigue to any window with the radiance otter grey roman blind. Offering quality, convenience and eye-catching character, this blind is a fantastic option. Using a sidewinder chain, this blind can be raised and lowered with ease to give peaceful shade at any time of day, whilst the embroidered pattern in cool, slate grey tone will offer a chic and timeless style. Product id: db-rom1065 fabric colour: otter grey material: 73% polyester 27% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Radiance Chrome Roman Blind
products.description: Conveying a striking elegance, the radiance chrome roman blind is a smart and eye-catching way to update a window. This neatly folding blind is made from polyester fabric with an embroidered, flowing pattern that really pops. Presented in a cool shade of grey, this blind is a great way to provide shade and to give windows a dash of cosiness and contemporary bohemian style. Product id: db-rom1064 fabric colour: chrome material: 73% polyester 27% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Windsor Mist Grey Roman Blind
products.description: The windsor mist grey roman blind provides a sophisticated way to style your windows with the practical benefits of a sleek and compact folding design. Marrying a silky feel fabric in a gentle grey hue with a glittering flowing pattern, this modern motif is sure to sparkle. This warm grey blind is a versatile choice that will team well with a range colours such as beige, gold, navy blue or lime green.

products.title: Ascot Mist Grey Roman Blind
products.description: This blind is a beautiful blend of modern, minimalist style and traditional charm. The ascot mist grey roman blind is created from a linen-look fabric for that natural, light and airy feel and is decorated with lovely embroidery in a pattern of leaves and branches. The cream and grey colour scheme is cool, fresh and versatile. Product id: db-rom1047 fabric colour: mist grey material: 63% polyester 20% cotton 11% viscose 6% linen lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Shine Silver Roman Blind
products.description: Their shine silver roman blind is one of their most flexible. Weve selected a fabric which will be easily effective in any room. By dusting this with a stunning layer of silver foil to fully capture the fluctuating shapes of the sunlight. By keeping this breathable linen mix otherwise relatively simple, weve allowed the sunshine to vary the effect of this blind throughout the day and seasons. Product id: db-rom1105 fabric colour: silver material: 60% linen 40% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Manhattan Silver Roman Blind
products.description: Are you looking for a contemporary style that will accent your room? Then hang the manhattan roman blind in your windows for that loft house feel. The striking design of the manhattan silver fabric will provide beautiful detailing within your space. We love this blind styled within cool, comptemporary grey environments. Product id: db-rom1116 fabric colour: silver material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Hampshire Stone Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Smarten up your interior with a practical window dressing solution in a chic and cotemporary style. The hampshire stone grey roman blind is made from a gorgeous cotton rich fabric with a jacquard style that gives depth and exceptional quality to this unique geometric motif. This blind is cool and sleek in stone grey yet very eye-catching to give your space a signature finish. Product id: db-rom1054 fabric colour: stone grey material: 86% cotton 14% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Galloway Granite Roman Blind
products.description: Strong stripes overlay each other in this design as their scottish-inspired galloway collection bring bold pattern in varied shades to your home. Product id: db-rom0939 fabric colour: granite material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining tape colour: light filtering: yes galloway granite roman blind in black.

products.title: Chic Charcoal Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Keep clean lines in a modern room with this chic roman blind in charcoal grey. You can maintain a minimalist look without compromising on design as the subtle pattern and texture of the luxurious fabric is embroidered with a bark effect. The result is refined by the use of material, specifically selected to float in loose folds within your frame. Perfect for including understated pizzazz. Product id: db-rom1102 fabric colour: charcoal grey material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Basket Weave Silver Grey Curtain
products.description: Their basket weave range is a combination of the soft fabric and attractive colours. Available as curtains and roman blinds, you will be able to find the one that suits your style. The basket weave silver grey roman blind is an excellent choice to transform your home. Product id: db-cur1012 fabric colour: silver grey material: 73% polyster 27% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes basket weave silver grey curtain in grey.

products.title: Crushed Velvet Steel Curtain
products.description: An affordable alternative to velvet, their velour fabrics bring elegance and rich texture to your home. Produced in yorkshire, we've included soft shades in their collection which tie in with any theme. Silvery, plush and ever popular. Their steel curtain using a crushed velvet fabric compliments any neutral theme. Product id: db-cur0999 fabric colour: steel material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes crushed velvet steel curtain in grey.

products.title: Basket Weave New Grey Curtain
products.description: Their basket weave range is a combination of the soft fabric and attractive colours. Available as curtains and roman blinds, you will be able to find the one that suits your style. The basket weave new grey curtain is an excellent choice to transform your home. Product id: db-cur0778 fabric colour: new grey material: 73%polyester 27%viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes basket weave new grey curtain in grey.

products.title: Ashanti, Olive - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti range features high quality fabrics and fashionable alternating width stripes in a broad range of colours. The olive adds mellow green stripes to the backdrop of cream, grey, and black to form a cool, contemporary look. The olive is perfect for when you want to add a few dashes of natural green to a room, without dominating it with a pure green, one-colour blind. Why not make a virtue of the green stripes, and use the olive to subtly change the colour scheme of your room? Ashanti, olive - roller blind the ashanti range features high quality fabrics and fashionable alternating width stripes in a broad range of colours.

products.title: Daphne, Charcoal - Roller Blind
products.description: The daphne in charcoal is a simple and neutral blind with a pretty and wistful dandelion fairy patterning. The fabric is soft and light, so light can filter through even when the blind is closed, and the smooth, effortless rolling mechanism makes for durable, easy-to-use window covering. Pair the charcoal with light browns and soft taupes in the bedroom, for a fresh, natural dcor style. Or instead, complement creams and golds to create a luxurious yet not over the top living space or dining room.

products.title: Perforated Aluminium Filtra Perfect Fit
products.description: This perforated aluminium filtra perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Perforated Grey Aluminium Perfect Fit
products.description: Perforated slats on aluminium perfect fit blinds shield your room from the full glare of the sun, whilst still allowing you to see out. Designed for high-sunlight rooms such as conservatories, they're a hardwearing blind that provides gentle sun filtering, even when closed struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.
